result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.dispoDesc: for purposes of repayment of service fees

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Steven J. Hoffmann

defendant.name: Hoffmann, Steven J.
defendant.address: N1643 County Road G, Ogema, WI 54459

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
11:17 am - 15CM1, 15CF21, 15CF22 - Defendant Steven J. Hoffmann appeared with attorney James Richard Lex.  Mark T. Fuhr appeared for the State of Wisconsin. DA states agreement. DA certifies victims rights compliance. DE pleads NO CONTEST to Ct. 2 in 15CM1 and Ct. 2 in 15CF21.   Court questions DE regarding the plea.  DA explains elements of charge.  Court finds plea/waiver to be free, etc.  Court finds factual basis does exist.  Court accepts plea, finds DE guilty and orders entry of JOC on Ct. 2 in 15CM1 & Ct. 2 in 15CF21 and on motion of DA dismisses Ct. 1 in 15CM1 & Ct. 1 in 15CF21 and dismiss and read-in 15CF22 for purposes of repayment of service fees. Comments by parties. Comments and ruling by Court. Appeal rights given. Adj. 11:42 am. 
Court imposes:
15CM1 (Ct. 2): Sentence withheld - 2 years probation. Conditions: $243 court costs; $200 DNAAS; $100 DOMAB; Apology; Obtain highschool diploma or it's equivalent
15CF21 (Ct. 2): Sentence witheld - 2 years probation. Conditions: $243 court costs; $200 DNAAS and submit sample; Apology; Obtain highschool diploma or it's equivalent; $65 SBDA for 15CF22

If not already completed DE must submit to booking at Sheriff's Dept prior to release. Defendant shall give written notice prior to any change in address or telephone number to the Clerk of this Court and Defense Attorney.  Defendant may not leave Price County without prior approval of the Court except for medical and court appointments. Defendant may not have contact with Kevin or Karen Kerr, unless there is written consent on file.

15CF21 & 15CF22 - Defendant Steven J. Hoffmann appeared with attorney James R. Lex.  Mark T. Fuhr appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Complaint acknowledged, reading waived.  Preliminary hearing requested, time limits waived.  Court orders Pre-trial conference be scheduled.  Amend bond by adding 15CF22 to 15CF21 case.
written consent for contact by K.K., DOB 12-16-56
written consent for contact by K.K., DOB 09-25-58
